ABOUT WORK CONTACT

ABOUT

Hi there! I'm passionate about ICT engineering, where technology, creativity, and problem-solving meet. It all started with my love for design, where I learned how to balance aesthetics and functionality in technology.

As I learned more about programming and creating apps, I found what truly excites me. Through my studies, I've gained experience with different technologies like web development, cybersecurity, data analytics, and AI. This has given me a wide range of skills to work with.

What sets my work apart is my focus on user-friendly design. I believe technology should be intuitive and enjoyable for users. That's why I'm dedicated to creating solutions that seamlessly fit into users' lives.

Currently, I'm on the lookout for opportunities to grow. Whether it's internships, part-time roles, or projects for recent graduates, I'm eager to apply my skills and contribute to innovative projects. If you have a challenge that needs both technical expertise and design finesse, I'm here to help. Let's work together!
